params.description: Parameters in the third level of analysis or HIGGS connectivity. if the second level is targeted then the first level will be performed in source screening mode

higgs_th.description: default <<1>>. Threshold for the HIGGS F-scores. it can be set to <<1>> or higher (if <<1>> responses whose posterior variance is larger than the posterior mean are discarded)

hg_lasso_th.description: default <<1>>. Threshold for the HG_LASSO F-scores. it can be set to <<1>> or higher (if <<1>> responses whose posterior variance is larger than the posterior mean are discarded)

IsCurv.description: default <<true>>. Depth compensation factor for the Lead Field of giri and sulci <<false>> (no compensation) <<true>> (compensation)

IsNeigh.description: default <<false>>. no neighbor structure <<false>>. Laplacian neighbor structure  <<true>>.

IsField.description: default <<2>>. Use projected Lead Field or 3D profile with prior of rotational invariance <<1>> (projected Lead Field) <<2>> (2D field isotropy)

aGiri.description: default <<5>>. Baseline of giri curvature factor

aSulc.description: default <<5>>. Baseline of sulci curvature factor. usually is set to be higher than aGiri

bGiri.description: default <<3>>. Scale of giri curvature factor

bSulc.description: default <<3>>. Scale of sulci curvature factor

axi.description: default <<1E-1>>. Instrumental noise inferior limit that can be defined according to experimental information, <<1E-1>> represents 10%

maxiter_outer.description: default <<60>>. Maximum number of iterations for the HIGGS EM outer loop

maxiter_inner.description: default <<30>>. Maximum number of iterations for the HIGGS hGLASSO inner loop

ntry.description: default <<3>>. Number of iterations forward in eveidence HIGGS eveidence optimality prediction to evaluate the performance of the hGLASSO Rayleigh threshold at every iteration

prew.description: default <<1>>. Perform prewarming of the HIGGS EM by means of a two-step methdod (first activation and then connectivity). <<0>> (no prewarming) <<1>> (does prewarming)

penalty.description: default <<2>>. Penalization model for HIGGS <<0>> (naive or vareta) <<1>> (hermitian graphical LASSO or hGLASSO) <<2>> (hermitian graphical Ridge or hgRidge). if set to <<1>> the computational cost is higher but with full statistical guaranties. <<2>> does not ofer full guaranties but can be very similar to <<1>>

rth1.description: default <<0.7>>. Inferior Rayleigh threshold <<0.7>> is the maximum of the Rayleigh distribution

rth2.description: default <<3.16>>. Superior Rayleigh threshold <<3.16>> is the 99% percentile of the Rayleigh distribution
